onboarding.subtitle: To get started, choose a transcription model

parakeet-tdt-0.6b-v2.name: Parakeet V2
parakeet-tdt-0.6b-v2.description: English only. The best model for English speakers.

moonshine-base.name: Moonshine Base
moonshine-base.description: Very fast, English only. Handles accents well.

groq-whisper-large-v3.name: Groq Whisper Large V3
groq-whisper-large-v3.description: Cloud API. Best accuracy, requires Groq API key.

groq-whisper-large-v3-turbo.name: Groq Whisper Turbo
groq-whisper-large-v3-turbo.description: Cloud API. Fast and accurate, requires Groq API key.

permissions.title: Permissions Required
permissions.description: PaperFlow needs a couple of permissions to work properly.

microphone.title: Microphone Access
microphone.description: Required to hear your voice for transcription.

accessibility.title: Accessibility Access
accessibility.description: Required to type transcribed text into your applications.

errors.checkFailed: Failed to check permissions. Please try again.
errors.requestFailed: Failed to request permission. Please try again.

modelSelector.downloadPrompt: Download a model below to get started with transcription.

shortcut.title: PaperFlow Shortcuts
shortcut.description: Configure keyboard shortcuts to trigger speech-to-text recording

errors.reset: Failed to reset shortcut to original value

language.title: Language
language.description: Select the language for speech recognition. Auto will automatically determine the language, while selecting a specific language can improve accuracy for that language.
language.descriptionUnsupported: Parakeet model automatically detects the language. No manual selection is needed.

pushToTalk.label: Push To Talk
pushToTalk.description: Hold to record, release to stop

audioFeedback.label: Audio Feedback
audioFeedback.description: Play sound when recording starts and stops

outputDevice.title: Output Device
outputDevice.description: Select your preferred audio output device for feedback sounds

volume.title: Volume
volume.description: Adjust the volume of audio feedback sounds

startHidden.label: Start Hidden
startHidden.description: Launch to system tray without opening the window.

autostart.label: Launch on Startup
autostart.description: Automatically start PaperFlow when you log in to your computer.

overlay.title: Overlay Position
overlay.description: Display visual feedback overlay during recording and transcription. On Linux 'None' is recommended.

pasteMethod.title: Paste Method
pasteMethod.description: Choose how text is inserted. Direct: simulates typing via system input. None: skips paste, only updates history/clipboard.

clipboardHandling.title: Clipboard Handling
clipboardHandling.description: Don't Modify Clipboard preserves your current clipboard contents after transcription. Copy to Clipboard leaves the transcription result in your clipboard after pasting.

translateToEnglish.label: Translate to English
translateToEnglish.description: Automatically translate speech from other languages to English during transcription.
translateToEnglish.descriptionUnsupported: Translation is not supported by the {{model}} model.

modelUnload.title: Unload Model
modelUnload.description: Automatically free GPU/CPU memory when the model hasn't been used for the specified time

customWords.title: Custom Words
customWords.description: Add words that are often misheard or misspelled during transcription. The system will automatically correct similar-sounding words to match your list.

snippets.title: Voice Snippets
snippets.description: Create shortcuts that expand trigger phrases into full text.

enable.label: Enable Snippets
enable.description: Automatically expand trigger phrases into their full text

add.title: Add Snippet
add.description: Create a new trigger phrase and its expansion

list.title: Your Snippets
list.empty: No snippets yet. Add one above to get started.

formatting.title: Auto-Formatting
formatting.description: Automatically format verbal cues into structured text.

enable.label: Enable Auto-Formatting
enable.description: Process verbal formatting commands and detect lists

lists.label: Auto-Format Lists
lists.description: Convert 'first, second, third' or 'one, two, three' into numbered lists

verbalCommands.label: Verbal Commands
verbalCommands.description: Process deletion, formatting, and bullet point commands

examples.title: Examples
examples.numberedList: "first X, second Y, third Z" → numbered list

tone.title: Tone Adjustment
tone.description: Automatically adjust writing style based on the active application.

enable.label: Enable Tone Adjustment
enable.description: Adjust transcription tone based on the app you're using

defaultTone.label: Default Tone
defaultTone.description: The tone to use when no app-specific mapping is found

developer.title: Developer Mode
developer.description: Preserve code syntax and recognize technical terms.

preserveSyntax.label: Preserve Code Syntax
preserveSyntax.description: Maintain camelCase, snake_case, and other code conventions

dictionary.title: Developer Dictionary
dictionary.description: Add technical terms to improve transcription accuracy

examples.acronyms: API, HTTP, JSON, URL, HTML, CSS, JS

enable.label: Enable Correction Detection
enable.description: Process verbal corrections like 'actually' and 'I mean'

contextAwareness.title: Context Awareness
contextAwareness.description: Read surrounding text to improve transcription accuracy for names and terms.

enable.label: Enable Context Reading
enable.description: Allow reading selected text from active windows

privacy.title: Privacy Notice
privacy.description: This feature reads text from your active window. All processing is done locally on your device. No data is sent to any external servers.

perAppPermissions.title: App Permissions
perAppPermissions.description: Control which apps can have their context read.

cloudTranscription.title: Cloud Transcription
cloudTranscription.description: Configure API keys for cloud-based transcription models.

groqApiKey.label: Groq API Key
groqApiKey.description: Required for Groq Whisper cloud models. Get your key at console.groq.com

enable.label: Multi-Language Mode
enable.description: Enable transcription of audio containing multiple languages (code-switching)

primaryLanguage.title: Primary Language
primaryLanguage.description: The main language you expect to speak

secondaryLanguage.title: Secondary Language
secondaryLanguage.description: The other language you may switch to

multilingual.supportedModels: Supported by Whisper Large and Groq Whisper models. Parakeet and Moonshine are English-only.

meeting.title: Meeting Mode

enable.label: Enable Meeting Mode
enable.description: Long-form recording with chunked transcription and optional summarization

chunkDuration.title: Chunk Duration
chunkDuration.description: How often to process audio during recording

autoSummarize.label: Auto-Summarize
autoSummarize.description: Generate a summary after the meeting ends

extractActionItems.label: Extract Action Items
extractActionItems.description: Identify action items from the meeting transcript

meeting.llmRequired: These features require a configured LLM provider in Post Process settings.

shortcut.title: Shortcut
shortcut.description: Configure a keyboard shortcut to start/stop meeting recording. The same shortcut toggles recording on and off.

history.title: Meeting History
history.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this meeting? This cannot be undone.

postProcessing.title: Post Process
postProcessing.disabledNotice: Post processing is currently disabled. Enable it in Debug settings to configure.

appleIntelligence.title: Apple Intelligence
appleIntelligence.description: Runs fully on-device. No API key or network access is required.
appleIntelligence.requirements: Requires an Apple Silicon Mac running macOS Tahoe (26.0) or later. Apple Intelligence must be enabled in System Settings.
appleIntelligence.unavailable: Apple Intelligence is not available on this device. Requires an Apple Silicon Mac running macOS Tahoe (26.0) or later with Apple Intelligence enabled in System Settings.

baseUrl.title: Base URL
baseUrl.description: API base URL for the selected provider. Only the custom provider can be edited.

apiKey.title: API Key
apiKey.description: API key for the selected provider.

model.title: Model
model.descriptionApple: Provide an optional numeric token limit or keep the default on-device preset.
model.descriptionCustom: Provide the model identifier expected by your custom endpoint.
model.descriptionDefault: Choose a model exposed by the selected provider.

prompts.title: Prompt

selectedPrompt.title: Selected Prompt
selectedPrompt.description: Select a template for refining transcriptions or create a new one. Use ${output} inside the prompt text to reference the captured transcript.

prompts.promptInstructionsPlaceholder: Write the instructions to run after transcription. Example: Improve grammar and clarity for the following text: ${output}
prompts.promptTip: Tip: Use ${output} to insert the transcribed text in your prompt.
prompts.selectToEdit: Select a prompt above to view and edit its details.
prompts.createFirst: Click 'Create New Prompt' above to create your first post-processing prompt.

history.title: History
history.empty: No transcriptions yet. Start recording to build your history!
history.deleteError: Failed to delete entry. Please try again.

logDirectory.title: Log Directory
logDirectory.description: Location where log files are stored

updateChecks.label: Check for Updates
updateChecks.description: Automatically check for new versions of PaperFlow

soundTheme.label: Sound Theme
soundTheme.description: Choose a sound theme for recording start and stop feedback

historyLimit.title: History Limit
historyLimit.description: Maximum number of history entries to keep

recordingRetention.title: Auto-Delete Recordings
recordingRetention.description: Automatically delete old recordings to save space

alwaysOnMicrophone.label: Always-On Microphone
alwaysOnMicrophone.description: Keep microphone active for faster response

clamshellMicrophone.title: Clamshell Microphone
clamshellMicrophone.description: Microphone to use when laptop lid is closed

postProcessingToggle.label: Post Processing
postProcessingToggle.description: Enable AI-powered text refinement after transcription

appendTrailingSpace.label: Append Trailing Space
appendTrailingSpace.description: Add a space after pasted transcription

appDataDirectory.title: App Data Directory
appDataDirectory.description: Location where PaperFlow stores its data

whisper.title: Whisper.cpp
whisper.description: High-performance inference of OpenAI's Whisper automatic speech recognition model
whisper.details: PaperFlow uses Whisper.cpp for fast, local speech-to-text processing. Thanks to the amazing work by Georgi Gerganov and contributors.

accessibility.permissionsDescription: PaperFlow needs accessibility permissions to type transcribed text.

appLanguage.title: Application Language
appLanguage.description: Change the language of the PaperFlow interface
